metadata.name: Unfreezing
metadata.description:
Animation NFT DANCE VIDEO 1/1.

Animation is an illusionary form of moving into music by using different techniques such as waving, gliding, glitching, pop from muscles, etc.

Nikkipop is the first street dance artist from Ukraine is showcasing his skills in NFT.

Pure body control is represented in this work.

The part of the sales will go to Ukrainian dancers who are volunteering in Ukrainian territories. Many of them cannot continue their activities and earn income from art. It's important to support them and motivate to get back to work as soon as possible.

Music by Fitzambrose.
Made in UA.

1080  x  1440 
The original file goes to the collector on demand.
